abstract.p: Dan Igoe, executive vice president at Barnhart/CMI Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations, is named president, succeeding Terry Barnhart, who remains chairman; Alice Connery is named to vacant post of president at Thompson Connect; John Englehart, worldwide executive vice president at Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, is named to new post of executive vice president for worldwide client services; John Leonard, executive vice president and global brand manager for Philips Electronics account at Paris office of Euro RSCG Worldwide, is named to new post of global client director at Euro RSCG Tatham, Chicago (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * Dan Igoe, executive vice president at Barnhart/CMI Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations, Denver, was named president, succeeding Terry Barnhart, who remains chairman. * Alice Connery was named to the vacant post of president at Thompson Connect, New York, part of the J. Walter Thompson unit of the WPP Group. She had been senior vice president at Rapp Collins Worldwide, New York, part of the Omnicom Group.

* Dan Igoe, executive vice president at Barnhart/CMI Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations, Denver, was named president, succeeding Terry Barnhart, who remains chairman. * Alice Connery was named to the vacant post of president at Thompson Connect, New York, part of the J. Walter Thompson unit of the WPP Group. She had been senior vice president at Rapp Collins Worldwide, New York, part of the Omnicom Group.

* John Englehart, worldwide executive vice president at Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide, London, was named to the new post of executive vice president for worldwide client services, based in New York. Lowe Lintas is part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group. * John Leonard, executive vice president and global brand manager for the Philips Electronics account at the Paris office of Euro RSCG Worldwide, part of Havas Advertising, was named to the new post of global client director at Euro RSCG Tatham, Chicago.
